SEARCH
Package gr.aueb.dmst.onepercent.programming

Class SuperAPI

java.lang.Object
gr.aueb.dmst.onepercent.programming.SuperAPI
Direct Known Subclasses:
ManagerAPI, MonitorAPI, MonitorCluster
public class SuperAPI extends Object
Class: SuperAPI is a superclass that contains a static variable, used in other classes, representing the docker client. It is used to create a docker client.

    • getDc

      public static com.github.dockerjava.api.DockerClient getDc()
      Gets the Docker client instance.
      Returns:
      The DockerClient instance represented by the static variable dc. This method is intended for testing purposes. It should only be used in testing scenarios to expose certain behavior for testing.
